name: Eden (itch) (JustMey)
description:
Eden is a (very) short experience about a boy of light attempting to purge the darkness from his world! Navigate the world from platform to platform to collect all the remnants of light for... well... for this mysterious voice in your head, who claims to help you on your quest. 

This was a practice project for animation, so although it's short and has teaser-like narrative, I hope you enjoy!
